topic.fullpath: Topic :: Communications :: Chat :: Internet Relay Chat

name: pyggy
short_description: Pyggy is an IRC (info)bot written in Python. He differs from other Python bots in that he has a LIFO send queue and flood protection. He is also fully modular and can be reloaded on the fly. Of course, he has your average infobot capabilities, too.
